channel.title: Chemicals on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Chemicals on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: No Acquiring This Taste
item.description: Today in Tedium: We love things that taste good. We hate things that taste bad. Perhaps it’s for that reason we don’t spend a lot of time talking about terrible-tasting things. But there’s plenty of reason that we should. The biggest is this: Sometimes, hiding in that terrible taste might be something so important that it can change the world in a noticeable way. Today’s Tedium is about a really terrible flavor that’s hiding all over your home.
